column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When it came time to pay the bill
column3: but only one with a different amount to charge. We instructed Kate to charge $17 on one card and $34 on each of the rest of the cards. Somehow
column4: she managed to overcharge THREE cards THREE times!! On top of that
column5: one card was charged $102. Where did that amount even come from?? She correctly refunded the overcharges
